name: places/ChIJYcFVrR_0wokRJdwVc92PkTE
formattedAddress: 1403 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA
adrFormatAddress: 1403 St Nicholas Ave, New York, NY 10033, USA

originalText.text: I came in to wax my nostrils and the worker was to busy speaking with a coworker in her own language. While busy in the conversation she overlined my mustache and tried covering it up with a tissue at first when she knew she messed  up. Horrible service!

text.text: I came in to wax my nostrils and the worker was to busy speaking with a coworker in her own language. While busy in the conversation she overlined my mustache and tried covering it up with a tissue at first when she knew she messed  up. Horrible service!

originalText.text: I had a TERRIBLE experience in this place. I went in to get my eyebrows threaded. I specifically told the woman doing my eyebrows not to leave them too thin. When she was done, she threaded off HALF of my eyebrows which took me months to grow out. When I complained and told her that she made them too thin, she continuously said “No they’re not, no they’re not”. Everyone realized how thin my eyebrows were after she did them. The customer service is terrible, the women who work here are rude and I never feel welcome coming in here. I will never go into this place ever again and I do not recommend it to anybody.

originalText.text: Cheap and cheerful, needed eyebrows done and was in the area for work. Great work done, speedy queue too. Would have rated excellent but they don't have frosted glass windows which means everyone on the street can see you getting your hairs pulled out, ooh err! Eyebrows are $6 not $8 as advertised on the site.

Eyebrows are $6 not $8 as advertised on the site.

originalText.text: Really hit or miss, entirely depends on who’s doing your brows. One lady completely ruined my left one by threading even after I solely requested waxing.

text.text: Really hit or miss, entirely depends on who’s doing your brows. One lady completely ruined my left one by threading even after I solely requested waxing.

originalText.text:
Service I received : $60 FACIAL with 20% off = $48

DO NOT EVER go to them if you are looking for a place to get a facial.

I purchased a “deep cleaning “ facial . I not only left with more SCARS ! But also product in my eye! (My vision was blurry until I cleared by tear ducts and rinsed my eyes with water) Also, my face still had SEVERAL VISIBLE black heads And clogged pores on my chin , on my cheeks , forehead, everywhere . In addition , the very next day, I had 2 new pimples. I had advised her that she missed to extract those pimples .. she said there was nothing there and then was about to poke my face with a metal tool AFTER finishing the entire facial. Which is a big no no !! Bc at this point your pores are already closed! Smh

During the process I had to tell her to unclog the pores that I knew were clogged (that she didn’t even touch or bother to look at)

Overall it was a very rushed and unprofessional process. They really don’t care to offer a professional facial. And for the price, it SHOULD be nothing less than sanitized and professional.

Only services I trust certain individuals with at this establishment is eye brow threading and Brazilian wax. Again, only specific girls within the establishment care and do a decent job.

There are two locations under same management

1. City brows St Nicholas 180th st
2. City brows St Nicholas between 183-182nd st

Avoid both for Facials !
